title: BIP 33: Phase 1 of Decentralizing Badger DAO
body:
TLDR: Badger DAO’s intention was always to move towards a completely decentralized autonomous organization over time. Our vision is to progressively decentralize with a phased approach while retaining the ability to respond quickly in crisis scenarios. This is critical to ensure protecting users funds remains our top priority.

Please see discussions for more detail. Voting for or against the structure laid out by the Badger Core Team.

Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-33-phase-1-of-decentralizing-badger-dao/2607
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
